events.name: IGDA x AWS Virtual Reality Special
events.description:
We're really excited to present an IGDA SG event dedicated to Virtual Reality, looking at some of the opportunities and projects happening on the VR side in Singapore's games industry. 

We've still got space for one more speaker, so if you've got something exciting to share, let us know!

As always, a huge thanks to our partners at AWS Singapore, for helping host us, and make this all possible

What: VR talks, showcases, and good company
When: Wendesday May 4th, 19.00 onwards 
Where: AWS Singapore, 23 church street, capital square, #10-01, singapore 049481

May the Fourth be with you,

The IGDA Singapore Team
events.location: Amazon Web Services, 23 Church st., Singapore 049481
